CVE-2023-12345.title: CVE-2023-12345: SQL Injection Vulnerability
CVE-2023-12345.description: This vulnerability allows SQL injection attacks. Use parameterized queries to prevent injection.

CVE-2023-12345.title: OWASP SQL Injection Prevention
CVE-2023-12345.description: Comprehensive guide on preventing SQL injection attacks using parameterized queries and input validation.

CWE-79.title: CWE-79: Cross-site Scripting (XSS)
CWE-79.description: XSS vulnerabilities allow attackers to inject malicious scripts. Sanitize all user input and use Content Security Policy.

CWE-79.title: OWASP XSS Prevention Cheat Sheet
CWE-79.description: Best practices for preventing XSS attacks including input validation, output encoding, and CSP headers.

CWE-89.title: CWE-89: SQL Injection
CWE-89.description: SQL injection vulnerabilities occur when user input is directly concatenated into SQL queries. Use parameterized queries or prepared statements.

CWE-89.title: SQL Injection Prevention Guide
CWE-89.description: Complete guide on preventing SQL injection including code examples and best practices.

sast.title: SAST Finding Remediation Guide
sast.description: General guidance on remediating findings from Static Application Security Testing tools.

sast.title: Secure Coding Practices
sast.description: Quick reference guide for secure coding practices to prevent common vulnerabilities.

dast.title: DAST Finding Remediation
dast.description: Guidance on fixing vulnerabilities discovered through Dynamic Application Security Testing.

sca.title: Dependency Vulnerability Remediation
sca.description: How to update or patch dependencies with known vulnerabilities discovered through Software Composition Analysis.

secrets.title: Secrets Management Best Practices
secrets.description: Guidance on properly managing secrets and avoiding hardcoded credentials in source code.

iac.title: Infrastructure as Code Security
iac.description: Best practices for securing infrastructure defined as code, including Terraform, CloudFormation, and Kubernetes configurations.
